title: Which is the best site for online singing Indian Hindi songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: THE best one I feel is the Starmaker App. In this along will Bollywood songs you can even sing Hollywood albums too. It is so much fun singing on this. Many video filters, audio assists and lyricals help to get better. It's just for fun!
Best website for Karaoke of India Hindi Songs http://hindikaraokeshop.com/
